import React from 'react' import Preloader from '../../common/Preloader/Preloader' import styles from './profileInfo.module.css' import avatar from '../../../assets/img/ava.jpg' import PfofileDescription from './ProfileDescription' import PopUp from '../../common/PopUp/popUp' import PopUpMessage from '../../common/PopUp/PopUpMessage' import PopUpAvatar from '../../common/PopUp/popUpAvatar' import ProfileAvatar from './ProfileAvatar/ProfileAvatar' const ProfileInfo = ({ profile, isMyPage, isFollowed, sendMessageMode, avatarPopup, setPopupAvatar, followUnfollow, userId, ...props }) => { return profile ?
{isMyPage &&
{ props.setEditProfile(true) }}>Edit Profile
} {!isMyPage &&
{ props.setMessageMode(true) }}>Send Message
} {!isMyPage ? isFollowed ?
{ followUnfollow(false, userId) }}> Unfollow
:
{ followUnfollow(true, userId) }}> Follow
: null } {sendMessageMode && { props.setMessageMode(false) }} />} {avatarPopup && { setPopupAvatar(false) }} />}
: } export default ProfileInfo;
